name: Better To Have Loved And Not Lost
description:
01. Run
02. Your Biggest Mistake
03. Robber
04. A Real Thing
05. All Accounts Considered 


Since the release of his Debut Album “Better to have Loved and not Lost” in July of 2009, Patrick struck intentionally and still holds the smoking gun in his hands. He is becoming one of the most assiduous musicians in Jacksonville and is shaping into an esteemed icon, against the flow of todays watered down musical acts. Every ounce of honesty, soul, and raw lyrical ethic is squeezed from the heart of Bass and dripped into three and a half minutes for your listening pleasure.
